item.title: Good Api Design for Publishing a crate
item.author: sensorfied@gmail.com (Mr. Wild)
item.description: A good DX will influences a good UX We live in API Economic and each API can give birth to another API. Your basic API design influences how well developers are able to consume it and even how they use it. Just like website design or product design, API design informs the user experience. There even a way to measure API usability but we will skip that. This post is about my analysis on practical API design in Rust.
